# Garden Horizons

> Garden Horizons is the ultimate Roblox farming experience with 5-minute shop cycles, dynamic weather, crop mutations, and real botanical learning. This fan site provides live stock tracking, active codes, hidden secrets, and comprehensive guides for players.

Garden Horizons reached 200,000+ players on launch day. Our site helps players maximize their farming efficiency with real-time shop inventory updates, working redemption codes, and detailed game mechanics guides.

## Core Content
- [Home](https://gardenhorizons.org/)：Complete overview of Garden Horizons gameplay, features, and getting started guide
- [Calculator](https://gardenhorizons.org/calculator)：Official profit calculator for calculating crop values, mutations, and ROI using Wiki formulas
- [Live Stock Tracker](https://gardenhorizons.org/stock)：Real-time inventory updates for Bill's Seed Shop and Molly's Gear Shop with 5-minute restock cycles
- [Active Codes](https://gardenhorizons.org/codes)：Working redemption codes for free Shillings, seeds, and gear - updated daily
- [Hidden Secrets](https://gardenhorizons.org/secrets)：Easter eggs, secret locations, morse code messages, and community theories about future updates

## Game Mechanics
- 5-Minute Shop Restocks：Both Bill's Seeds and Molly's Gear restock every 5 minutes with limited quantities
- Dynamic Weather System：Rain (+25% growth), Fog (FOGGY mutations), Storm (+2x growth), Snow (CHILLED variants)
- Ripeness Stages：Crops continue ripening beyond harvest-ready, reaching 'Lush' status for 3x selling value
- Crop Mutations：Weather-dependent mutations like FOGGY (1.2x), FLOODED (1.8x), and CHILLED variants
- Flora Diary：Real botanical knowledge system teaching facts about plants

## Active Codes (Updated 2026-02-27)
- RELEASE：2500 Shillings + 15x Carrot Seeds + 3x Corn Seeds
- DAWN：1x Dawnfruit Seed (rare)
- GIFT：1x Cabbage Seed + 1x of every Sprinkler
- 358：2000 Shillings (secret code)

## Shop Information
- Bill's Seed Shop：Sells seeds from Carrot ($50) to rare Plum ($60,000)
- Molly's Gear Shop：Sells tools from Watering Can to Super Sprinkler ($15,000)
- Stock Rarity：Common, Uncommon, Rare seeds with limited quantities per restock
- Shared Inventory：Stock is shared across all servers

## Hidden Secrets & Easter Eggs
- Fountain Launch Glitch：Jump on center fountain to fly into the air
- IGMA Device：Morse code device on hill translating to "THEY ARE COMING"
- Secret Laboratory：Hidden room with glowing potion flask behind Cell Shop
- Plot 3 Cave：Mysterious blocked cave that previously contained a secret rose
- Magnifying Glasses：Transparent objects found in multiple secret locations
- Hidden Bench：Peaceful cave spot for hanging out with friends

## Resources
- [Play Garden Horizons](https://www.roblox.com/games/130594398886540/Garden-Horizons)：Official Roblox game link
- [Sitemap](https://gardenhorizons.org/sitemap.xml)：Complete site structure

## About
Garden Horizons Fan Site is an unofficial community resource providing real-time stock tracking, active codes, and comprehensive guides. We are not affiliated with Roblox Corporation. The site helps players maximize their farming efficiency and discover hidden content.
